Step 4: Transform the 2D sketch to 3D space and extrude Create a new coordinate system with the same orientation and translation vector as the initial one but located at [0.2844, 0.0981, 0]. Use the Euler angles [0, 0, 0] for this new coordinate system. Rotate and translate the 2D sketch to this new coordinate system and extrude the sketch by a depth of 0.039 towards the normal, and 0 depth in the opposite direction. This concludes the instructions for generating the parametric CAD model based on the provided CAD Assembly JSON.</description>
